#General utility programs and functions

= Introduction =

This is a general index of utilities that may be useful for SAP systems.


= Utilities =

  * Report ZDELETE_SYSMSG_HISTORY to delete the history of whether users have read an SM02 message.  This means the system message will pop up each time  a user logs on, regardless of whether they have seen it before or not.  Handy for reminding users they are on production, etc.
